name: Sphere Game (Dzintars The Kvassnik)
description:
Sphere Game is a crappy puzzle game I made since I thought it would be good for my skill level and would give me experience, however, people started getting interested in the project.

The game is about controlling a sphere to press buttons, control elements of the level, and most importantly - get the glowing core energy sphere to the end teleporter.

controls - WASD/ arrow keys to move, ESC to pause, R to restart

Story - a cliché evil ai hates humanity story

ost - the ost isn't very good and was made in LMMS before I used FL STUDIO 20

graphics - decent looking but could tank performance on potato pcs, so I suggest checking the options menu

In short this game in my opinion isn't very good, but it was fun making it so I'm proud of it :D
